channel.title: success on alexchiri.com
channel.description: Recent content in success on alexchiri.com

item.title: Success
item.description: I was having a discussion with one of my friends the other day… 7 habits I started telling him all about this good book[1] I just finished and that I found quite inspiring: you have these 7 habits everyone needs to develop, 3 for yourself, 3 for your relations with the others and 1 to grease the wheels for the others 6, to keep the thing going. You have to be proactive, to be aware that you can make the choice of how you act, no matter what environment you’re in.
